climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards. USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: HELPS MOISTURIZE DRY SKIN: Earth Mama's Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is a calendula coconut balm formulated for safely comforting and moisturizing chapped, dry skin on babies, big kids, and everyone in the family.
USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC: This certified organic skin care alternative to petroleum jelly is Leaping Bunny Certified and EWG Verified with the lowest hazard rating a product can achieve.

NO WORRISOME CHEMICALS: This organic face moisturizer balm never uses any petrolatum, mineral oil, artificial preservatives, or fragrances, so feel free to slather around baby's mouth or any other areas in need of moisturizing.

DERMATOLOGIST & CLINICALLY TESTED FOR IRRITATION: Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm provides intense moisturizing for everything from dry cheeks and runny red noses to chapped lips, cuticles and dry skin.
TRUSTED BY MAMAS WORLDWIDE: Earth Mama’s products are formulated with effective organic ingredients, safely supporting the whole family, including pregnant and breastfeeding women.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Slather with Abandon An Organic Alternative to Petroleum Jelly Earth Mama's Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is a calendula coconut balm formulated for safely comforting and moisturizing chapped, dry skin on babies, big kids, and everyone in the family. This certified organic cruelty-free alternative to petroleum jelly is made without petroleum, parabens, artificial fragrances, or preservatives. So, it’s safe around your baby’s drooly chins and runny noses, or anywhere that needs extra moisture.

Helps Moisturize Dry Skin Earth Mama's Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is a calendula coconut balm formulated for safely comforting and moisturizing chapped, dry skin on babies big kids, and everyone in the family. USDA Certified Organic This certified organic alternative to petroleum jelly is Leaping Bunny Certified and EWG Verified with the lowest hazard rating a product can achieve. No Worrisome Chemicals Never any petrolatum, mineral oil, artificial preservatives or fragrances so feel free to slather around baby's mouth or any other areas in need of moisturizing. Dermatologist and Clinically Tested for Irritation Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm provides intense moisturizing for everything from dry cheeks and runny red noses to lips, cuticles and dry skin. Trusted by Mamas Worldwide Earth Mama’s products are formulated with effective organic ingredients, safely supporting the whole family, including pregnant and breastfeeding women.

What can you put on baby's face? Earth Mama’s Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is a certified organic calendula coconut balm formulated for safely moisturizing chapped, dry skin on baby’s face. What cream can I use on my baby's face? Earth Mama’s Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm can be used as a baby face cream, as well as a balm for dry skin anywhere. What is safer than petroleum jelly? Earth Mama’s Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is an organic alternative to petroleum jelly, formulated without petrolatum, mineral oil, artificial fragrances or preservatives. What are the ingredients in Earth Mama cheek balm? This certified organic balm contains organic sunflower seed oil, beeswax, coconut oil, shea butter, and calendula. What cream is good for baby red cheeks? Earth Mama’s Organic Baby Face Nose & Cheek Balm is a safe, organic alternative for petroleum jelly that’s formulated for chapped, red cheeks or any dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for face & bum! Cloth diaper safe!
reviews.reviewText: So happy to have an unscented, all-natural, organic balm that is safe for my baby's delicate skin! Originally purchased this to use as diaper balm. Works wonders! Thinly applied small amount to baby's diaper area any time the slightest red appeared and it helped restore the skin almost overnight! Has worked well with cloth diapers- seems to wash out fine- no staining or repelling noted! With the colder weather, I have now been using it on baby's face as well before going outside to help protect the skin from chapping! Again, I love that it is unscented and therefore isn't noxious to apply on nose and face. Tube is small but a tiny amount goes along way. Melts onto skin and spreads easily for thin application. Noticed some oil separation in the tube during the warmer weather months, but have continued to use product as is without any issues. Very happy with this product and have recommended it to friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick cream, but works
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help my baby’s drool rash. The cream is working and the rash is slowly going away. I like how the cream is natural. The cream is thick, but is easy to apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Review from wife…Do yourself a favor: BUY THIS!! After using the nipple butter for breast feeding, it was a no brainer to try this once my baby started developing drool rash from teething. Works like a charm! Unscented, and while some say it’s “sticky”, I don’t feel that way at all- it’s thick and provides a seal. Perfect to use before naps and before bedtime when baby won’t be messing with their face. I also like to use this on rough skin patches- ankles, wrists, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loved the balm, it really helped my baby through baby acne and dryness. The natural clean ingredients are great too. The only thing I wish was different is the oil separation in the tube. Sometimes no matter how much you squeeze the tube around to try and mix it before dispensing, it still doesn’t remix and you get a squirt of oil before the balm comes out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrating, thick, oily
reviews.reviewText: Great for newborn! Using for his cradle cap too. It's thick and oily so maybe just don't use if wearing a super nice outfit for oil stain. But love this stuff! Clean ingredients and doesn't irritate his skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a dream
reviews.reviewText: I’d tried everything on my grand baby’s face and nothing worked until now. So pleased with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My baby is constantly drooling. I admit Mama and Dada kissing his cheeks constantly probably also adds to his chapped skin. Sometimes it can get really red. However, I put this stuff on at night before bed, and we always wake up to soft, moisturized, not-red chubby cheeks!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not to fond of the smell
reviews.reviewText: The smell isn't pleasant. I really don't see much of a change either and I've been using it twice a day for several weeks.

[Photos made black and white to help see skin texture better.] We have been dealing with dermatitis on my baby's face since she started drooling more and eating solids at 4 months. The rash was on her chin, cheeks, nose, and on her lower eyelids. She would spread drool around her face with teething toys and her hands and rub her eyes a lot. We tried to keep her face and rash dry but any time it got wet or we were out in sunlight, it looked pretty bad / dry / inflamed. We worried it might be a food allergy. Have been using this ointment a couple times a day for almost a week and the rash is much improved... only a few individual bumps here and there but the rash is no longer red and bumpy and dry. I'm very happy with the result. We went with this product because I didn't want to use vaseline or aquaphor around her mouth (in case of ingestion) and opted for beeswax-based product instead. The smell is very mild. It is worth a try if you are dealing with a similar rash. Like other reviewers said, product seems to separate oil and the thicker balm. Still works. It is pricier from this seller than from walmart, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. My daughter had a very bad skin condition at 2months of age. My doc recommended something that i knew does not work even on adults. I did some research and finally chose this one pretty unsure. But once i started using it i saw the difference in my daughter's skin immediately... i still use it regularly after bath and before bedtime even though the skin dryness and oozing us completely gone... love it
The cream worked wonders for my bubs cheeks which went from being chapped to super soft. Very happy with product and good to know that it has natural ingredients.
Worked perfectly on my 3 month old baby face. He had a small moisture rash, cleared it within a day!!
